name: Carson Johnson
about: Hello my name is Carson Johnson! I am a student at Santa Fe College and future student at the University of Florida. I major in Computer Science and want to become a Software Engineer at a Big Tech company.

workExperience.title: .NET Engineer Intern
workExperience.description: Gained experience working in several areas of the largest BSS on AWS, the Ascendon product. Technologies:  C#, .NET Core, SQL, AWS, Azure, Agile Scrum, Sprints, Jira, Git, Elastic Search, back-end Responsibilities: Developed an API stub for one of the companies largest payment gateway vendor Decreased testing costs by 20%, integrated 3D Secure 2.0 into the stub to allow for 95% fraud protection. Created a component test to test the stub asynchronous as I developed it; 3D Secure 2.0 flow testing included. Presented to CEO and executives; made technical concepts easy to grasp; received 100% positive feedback

workExperience.title: Career Insights Program Fellow
workExperience.description: Selected out of 2,000+ applicants to participate in Meta X ColorStack's Career Insights Program. Established connections with Meta engineers; participated in technical interview preparation. Led a diverse team, developed a software solution utilizing VR to increase access to jobs.

workExperience.title: Program Participant
workExperience.description: Selected out of 440 applicants; participated in Tech Mini-Mester; enhanced tech & soft skills with mentorship. Developed an AI chatbot using Python; Completed workshops on Intro to Cloud Computing/AWS, Built 10K NFT Collection, GitHub, Cyber Secure Coding, and Networked with Capital One executives and associates.

name: Alia Abdulahi
about: Hi! My name is Alia. I am a software engineer that went back to get my Bachelors in Computer Science. I also work in education and work with underrepresented students in the Boston Public Schools system learn how to code. My passions are in creating equitable pathways to technology for students, cooking, and learning new things.

workExperience.title: Computer Science Lab Leader
workExperience.description: I teach underrepresented Black and Latinx students in the Boston Public Schools system computer science skills to help them access economic opportunities in Boston's innovation economy.

workExperience.title: Software Engineering Bootcamp Teaching Assistant
workExperience.description: Teach fullstack MERN to students, host office hours, and grade work.

workExperience.title: Associate Software Engineer
workExperience.description: Coded front-end features in React and back-end features in Ruby on Rails.

education.school: The Grace Hopper Program at Fullstack Academy
